= Introductory Networking =

- OSI (Open Systems Interconnection) Model: Used to demonstrate networking(TCP/IP model)
1. Application
2. Presentation
3. Session
4. Transport
5. Network
6. Data Link
7. Physical

- Layer 7 Application:  Provides an interface, transmits data to the presentation layer
- Layer 6 Presentation:  Translates data from the application to a standardised format, handles
encryption, compression, or other transformations to the data.  When complete passed to the session
- Layer 5 Session:  
Mnemonics:  Anxious Pale Shakespeare Treated Nervous Drunks Patiently
